Property Location
With a stay at The Brandize - Guest House in Torquay (English Riviera), you'll be minutes from Torre Abbey and Riviera International Conference Centre. This 4-star guesthouse is within close proximity of Abbey Sands and Princess Theatre.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance. Additional features include a picnic area and barbecue grills.

Dining
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary full breakfast is included.
